name: Family Gunjin Shogi
description:
PlayStation Store Description (from Ad Blurbs)

Family Gunjin Shogi is a board game for player to enjoy “gunjin shogi” (Japanese chess with military theme) to the fullest. The key to outwit the highly intelligent computer-controlled opponent is to think a few steps forward when layout your pieces.Tease your brain with this game today!

This content is compatible with PlayStation®3 and PSP® (PlayStation®Portable).
